review: I  reside in Bijnor about  165 km. AWAY  FROM  APOLLO  Hospital.  It  is  the trust  in the  Docter Raju Vaishya that encourages  me to go to him and  seek his advice. His  advice  and assurance  keep the  patient  reassured and  satisfied.  He is  a very  able  doctor  and  knows  how  treat a patient. I fully  trust  him and  that  is why  I go all the way  from  Bijnor to Apollo whenever  I need  medical  supervision. Thank you Doctor  for your  help

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had a car crash injury. Visited some surgeons and was advised leg debridement. On some relative advise I went to Dr Raju Vaish in delhi. I am so fortunate that he has saved my leg. Now it has healed and almost normal. He is a professor ** **** **** ******** ********* *** surgical experience.

I went to Dr. Raju for my mother‚Äôs shoulder pain, I think Dr. Raju diagnosis was well but I was shocked when I asked for the breakdown of the charges of injections. The injection cost was just Rs. 200 but to inject it by Dr.Raju I was charged Rs.4,000 which was very high for me. I think patient should be well informed about the  break of the treatment and should give option to avail it or not avail it if it is over and above of the budget. Injections charge of Rs.4,000 in addition to constantly fees of Rs. 1,200 is too much for any middle class person like me.
